flavor_text_entries.platinum:
It flaps its small wings busily to
fly. Using its beak, it searches
in grass for prey.
flavor_text_entries.red:
Eats bugs in
grassy areas. It
has to flap its short wings at
high speed to
stay airborne.
flavor_text_entries.blue:
Eats bugs in
grassy areas. It
has to flap its short wings at
high speed to
stay airborne.
flavor_text_entries.yellow:
Inept at flying
high. However, it
can fly around very fast to
protect its ter­
ritory.
flavor_text_entries.gold:
It flaps its short
wings to flush out
insects from tall grass. It then
plucks them with
its stubby beak.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
Very protective of
its territory, it
flaps its short wings busily to
dart around at
high speed.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
To protect its
territory, it
flies around ceaselessly,
making high-
pitched cries.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
SPEAROW has a very loud cry that can
be heard over half a mile away.
If its high, keening cry is heard echoing all around, it is a sign that
they are warning each other of danger.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:

be heard over half a mile away.
If its high, keening cry is heard echoing all around, it is a sign that
they are warning each other of danger.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Its loud cry can be heard over half a mile
away. If its high, keening cry is heard
echoing all around, it is a sign that they
are warning each other of danger.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
It busily flits around here and there.
Even if it is frail, it can be a tough
foe that uses MIRROR MOVE.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap
its short wings at high speed to stay
airborne.

flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Spearow has a very loud cry that can be heard over
half a mile away. If its high, keening cry is heard echoing all
around, it is a sign that they are warning each other of danger.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Spearow has a very loud cry that can be heard over
half a mile away. If its high, keening cry is heard echoing all
around, it is a sign that they are warning each other of danger.
flavor_text_entries.sun:
Its short wings make it inept at flying.
It moves about hurriedly and pecks at
Bug-type Pokémon in the tall grass.
flavor_text_entries.moon:
Farmers whose fields are troubled by bug
Pokémon appreciate Spearow for its vigorous
appetite and look after it.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
Its reckless nature leads it to stand up to
others—even large Pokémon—if it has to protect
its territory.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
Due to its short wings, it can’t fly long
distances. It wanders about restlessly and
pecks at bug Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu:
Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around
very fast to protect its territory.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-eevee:
Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around
very fast to protect its territory.
